name: Battlefield Healer

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: You must successfully cast a conjuration (healing) spell on an ally after being hit by an attack of opportunity, or have the Battle, Chaplain, or Healed background.

sections.body: When attempting a concentration check caused by receiving damage (including ongoing damage), you reduce the damage taken by 50% for the purposes of determining the concentration check DC.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Over time, provoke at least 20 attacks of opportunity for casting conjuration (healing) spells on allies. These spells don't have to succeed to count.
sections.name: Goal

sections.body: You automatically succeed at concentration checks for conjuration (healing) spells caused by taking damage.
sections.name: Completion Benefit

description: In even the fiercest battles, you risk life and limb to save your allies.
